name: Home-Run smoothies
description:
Bat fruit into smoothies to fill as many orders as you can before the customer get tired of waiting! Too many wrong orders and you're out of business.

Use Left, Right, A, or D to rotate the platform to redirect the fruit. Be careful, the platform resets every time a fruit is redirected ;D

Esc to pause

Customers who have waited too long will take away from your score. But a WRONG order will count against you.

The idea was to have a person batting the fruit into the smoothies for a storyline,  but both artists I joined up with never participated in the project. So I, the programmer, got stuck with last minute art work to do. I'm not an artist, as you can tell. haha

If anyone would like to update the art in this game, shoot me message! I'll more than likely take you up on the offer!

I want to complete this game to it's full design.

HAVE FUN!
